Title: Haus Voithofer
Slogan: "Just homely" is our slogan by which we were able to win a lot of regular guests. We therefore hope to welcome you too. If you want to spend your holiday in a family run house and if you wand to enjoy the beautiful landscape we would be happy if you contact us by e-mail. Of course you can call us at any time. See you soon in Neukirchen am Gro√üvenediger.
RoomsIntro: All our rooms are equiped with shower/toilet, balcony and cabel-TV. Some of our rooms include an additional bed. A refrigerator is also available for our guests. Please have a look at our picture-galery to get an impression.
FlatIntro: Our holiday-flat consists of two double-bedrooms (incl. additional bed). Each bedrooms has it's own bathroom including toilet and cable TV. The kitchen is equiped with modern electric appliances ( electric kitchen stove, dishwasher, coffee machine...). Furtherone there is a comfortable living and dinning room. Of course you can also use our lounge.
